mcq.statement: In which constitutional amendment was the name of the former NWFP changed to Khyber Pakhtunkhwa (KPK)?
mcq.one_liner: The name of the former NWFP was changed to **Khyber Pakhtunkhwa (KPK)** in the 18th amendment of the 1973 constitution.
